content: the natural curl of this mini trivet is akin to giving your mug a little hug the mug hug trivet practical minimalist and the perfect every-day essential make a few dozen for yourself family and friends perfect for stocking stuffers housewarming or just to add a special touch around your home these little coasters could simply be used for flower vases or a place mat for small items around your home you can easily crochet a set of 4 in 20-30 minutes depending on speed level this household item only requires a small amount of worsted weight yarn - it has been the perfect way for me to use up my vanna s choice scraps i hope you enjoy this pattern please read the notes on sale and distribution below *this pattern is offered as a free download courtesy of lady jay crochet please do not alter in any way claim as your own or try to resell the pattern as your own sale of finished items is permitted with pattern credit given to lady jay crochet published september 21st 2019* please do not hesitate to reach out with any questions
